00048 void histo_eq (arr2<float> &img, float &minv, float &maxv, arr<double> &newpos)
00049   {
00050   const int nbins=100;
00051   arr<int> bincnt (nbins);
00052   bincnt.fill(0);
00053   int pixels=0;
00054 
00055   double fact = 1./(maxv-minv);
00056   for (tsize i=0; i<img.size1(); ++i)
00057     for (tsize j=0; j<img.size2(); ++j)
00058       if (img[i][j]>-1e30)
00059         {
00060         img[i][j] = float((img[i][j]-minv)*fact);
00061         int idx = int(img[i][j]*nbins);
00062         idx=max(0,min(idx,nbins-1));
00063         ++bincnt[idx];
00064         ++pixels;
00065         }
00066 
00067   newpos.alloc(nbins+1);
00068   int accu=0;
00069   for (int m=0; m<nbins; ++m)
00070     {
00071     newpos[m] = double(accu)/pixels;
00072     accu += bincnt[m];
00073     }
00074   newpos[nbins]=1.;
00075 
00076   for (tsize i=0; i<img.size1(); ++i)
00077     for (tsize j=0; j<img.size2(); ++j)
00078       if (img[i][j]>-1e30)
00079         {
00080         int idx = int(img[i][j]*nbins);
00081         idx=max(0,min(idx,nbins-1));
00082         double frac = nbins*img[i][j] - idx;
00083         img[i][j] = float((1-frac)*newpos[idx] + frac*newpos[idx+1]);
00084         img[i][j] = float(minv+(maxv-minv)*img[i][j]);
00085         }
00086   }
00087 
00088 void pro_mollw (const Healpix_Map<float> &map, double lon0, double lat0,
00089   int xsize, arr2<float> &img, float &minv, float &maxv, bool smooth)
00090   {
00091   int ysize=xsize/2;
00092   img.alloc(xsize,ysize);
00093   img.fill(-1e35);
00094   double xc=(xsize-1)/2., yc=(ysize-1)/2.;
00095 
00096   rotmatrix rot;
00097   rot.Make_CPAC_Euler_Matrix(0,-lat0,-lon0);
00098 
00099   minv=1e30;
00100   maxv=-1e30;
00101   for (tsize i=0; i<img.size1(); ++i)
00102     for (tsize j=0; j<img.size2(); ++j)
00103       {
00104       double u = 2*(i-xc)/(xc/1.02);
00105       double v = (j-yc)/(yc/1.02);
00106       bool mask = ((u*u/4 + v*v) <= 1);
00107       if (mask)
00108         {
00109         pointing ptg (halfpi-(asin(2/pi*(asin(v) + v*sqrt((1-v)*(1+v))))),
00110                       -halfpi*u/max(sqrt((1-v)*(1+v)),1e-6));
00111         vec3 pnt = rot.Transform(ptg.to_vec3());
00112         if (smooth)
00113           img[i][j] = map.interpolated_value(pnt);
00114         else
00115           img[i][j] = map[map.ang2pix(pnt)];
00116         if (!approx<double>(img[i][j],Healpix_undef))
00117           {
00118           if (img[i][j]<minv) minv=img[i][j];
00119           if (img[i][j]>maxv) maxv=img[i][j];
00120           }
00121         }
00122       }
00123   }
00124 
00125 void pro_gno (const Healpix_Map<float> &map, double lon0, double lat0,
00126   int xsize, double delta, arr2<float> &img, float &minv, float &maxv,
00127   bool smooth)
00128   {
00129   rotmatrix rot;
00130   rot.Make_CPAC_Euler_Matrix(lon0,-lat0,0);
00131 
00132   double start=-(xsize/2.)*delta;
00133   img.alloc(xsize,xsize);
00134   minv=1e30;
00135   maxv=-1e30;
00136   for (tsize i=0; i<img.size1(); ++i)
00137     for (tsize j=0; j<img.size2(); ++j)
00138       {
00139       vec3 pnt (1,-(start+i*delta), start+j*delta);
00140       pnt = rot.Transform(pnt);
00141         if (smooth)
00142           img[i][j] = map.interpolated_value(pnt);
00143         else
00144           img[i][j] = map[map.ang2pix(pnt)];
00145       if (!approx<double>(img[i][j],Healpix_undef))
00146         {
00147         if (img[i][j]<minv) minv=img[i][j];
00148         if (img[i][j]>maxv) maxv=img[i][j];
00149         }
00150       }
00151   }
00152 
00153 void colorbar (LS_Image &img, const Palette &pal, int xmin, int xmax,
00154   int ymin, int ymax, bool flippal, const arr<double> &newpos)
00155   {
00156   int nbins = newpos.size()-1;
00157   for (int i=xmin; i<=xmax; ++i)
00158     {
00159     double val = (double(i)-xmin)/(xmax-xmin);
00160     if (nbins>0)
00161       {
00162       int idx = int(val*nbins);
00163       idx=max(0,min(idx,nbins-1));
00164       double frac = nbins*val - idx;
00165       val = (1-frac)*newpos[idx] + frac*newpos[idx+1];
00166       }
00167     if (flippal) val=1-val;
00168     Colour c = pal.Get_Colour(float(val));
00169     for (int j=ymin; j<=ymax; ++j)
00170       img.put_pixel(i,j,c);
00171     }
00172   }
00173 
00174 string conv (double val)
00175   {
00176   ostringstream os;
00177   if (abs(val)>100 || abs(val)<0.01)
00178     {
00179     os << setw(10) << setprecision(3) << scientific << val;
00180     return os.str();
00181     }
00182   os << setw(10) << setprecision(6) << fixed << val;
00183   return trim(os.str());
00184   }
00185 
00186 void usage()
00187   {
00188   cout <<
00189     "\nUsage:\n"
00190     "  map2tga <parameter file>\n\n"
00191     "or:\n"
00192     "  map2tga <input file> <output file> [-sig <int>] [-pal <int>]\n"
00193     "    [-xsz <int>] [-bar] [-log] [-asinh] [-lon <float>] [-lat <float>]\n"
00194     "    [-mul <float>] [-add <float>] [-min <float>] [-max <float>]\n"
00195     "    [-res <float>] [-title <string>] [-flippal] [-gnomonic]\n"
00196     "    [-interpol] [-equalize] [-viewer <viewer>]\n\n";
00197   planck_fail_quietly("Incorrect usage");
00198   }

00200 } // unnamed namespace
00201 
00202 int map2tga_module (int argc, const char **argv)
00203   {
00204   announce ("map2tga");
00205   if (argc<2) usage();
00206 
00207   string infile = "";
00208   string outfile = "";
00209   string title = "";
00210   int xres = 1024;
00211   bool bar = false, mollpro=true;
00212   double lat0=0, lon0=0, res=1*arcmin2rad;
00213   float usermin=-1e30, usermax=1e30, offset=0, factor=1;
00214   bool min_supplied=false, max_supplied=false;
00215   bool logflag=false, asinhflag=false, eqflag=false;
00216   int palnr = 4;
00217   int colnum=1;
00218   bool flippal = false;
00219   bool interpol = false;
00220   string viewer = "";
00221 
00222   if (argc>2)
00223     {
00224     infile = argv[1];
00225     outfile = argv[2];
00226     int m=3;
00227     while (m<argc)
00228       {
00229       int mstart = m;
00230       string arg = argv[m];
00231       if (arg == "-sig") { stringToData(argv[m+1],colnum); m+=2; }
00232       if (arg == "-pal") { stringToData(argv[m+1],palnr); m+=2; }
00233       if (arg == "-xsz") { stringToData(argv[m+1],xres); m+=2; }
00234       if (arg == "-bar") { bar=true; ++m; }
00235       if (arg == "-log") { logflag=true; ++m; }
00236       if (arg == "-equalize") { eqflag=true; ++m; }
00237       if (arg == "-asinh") { asinhflag=true; ++m; }
00238       if (arg == "-lon") { stringToData(argv[m+1],lon0); lon0*=degr2rad; m+=2; }
00239       if (arg == "-lat") { stringToData(argv[m+1],lat0); lat0*=degr2rad; m+=2; }
00240       if (arg == "-mul") { stringToData(argv[m+1],factor); m+=2; }
00241       if (arg == "-add") { stringToData(argv[m+1],offset); m+=2; }
00242       if (arg == "-min")
00243         {
00244         stringToData(argv[m+1],usermin);
00245         min_supplied=true;
00246         m+=2;
00247         }
00248       if (arg == "-max")
00249         {
00250         stringToData(argv[m+1],usermax);
00251         max_supplied=true;
00252         m+=2;
00253         }
00254       if (arg == "-res")
00255         { stringToData(argv[m+1],res); res*=arcmin2rad; m+=2; }
00256       if (arg == "-title") { title = argv[m+1]; m+=2; }
00257       if (arg == "-viewer") { viewer = argv[m+1]; m+=2; }
00258       if (arg == "-flippal") { flippal=true; ++m; }
00259       if (arg == "-gnomonic") { mollpro=false; ++m; }
00260       if (arg == "-interpol") { interpol=true; ++m; }
00261 
00262       if (mstart==m)
00263         {
00264         cout << "unrecognized option: " + arg << endl;
00265         usage();
00266         }
00267       }
00268     }
00269   else
00270     {
00271     paramfile params (argv[1]);
00272     infile = params.find<string>("infile");
00273     outfile = params.find<string>("outfile");
00274     colnum = params.find<int>("sig",colnum);
00275     palnr = params.find<int>("pal",palnr);
00276     flippal = params.find<bool>("flippal",flippal);
00277     xres = params.find<int>("xsz",xres);
00278     bar = params.find<bool>("bar",bar);
00279     logflag = params.find<bool>("log",logflag);
00280     eqflag = params.find<bool>("equalize",eqflag);
00281     asinhflag = params.find<bool>("asinh",asinhflag);
00282     lon0 = degr2rad*params.find<double>("lon",lon0);
00283     lat0 = degr2rad*params.find<double>("lat",lat0);
00284     factor = params.find<float>("mul",factor);
00285     offset = params.find<float>("add",offset);
00286     usermin = params.find<float>("min", usermin);
00287     if (usermin>-1e29) min_supplied = true;
00288     usermax = params.find<float>("max", usermax);
00289     if (usermax<1e29) max_supplied = true;
00290     res = arcmin2rad*params.find<double>("res",res);
00291     title = params.find<string>("title","");
00292     viewer = params.find<string>("viewer","");
00293     string tmp = params.find<string>("pro","");
00294     if (tmp == "gno") mollpro=false;
00295     interpol = params.find<bool>("interpol",interpol);
00296     }
00297 
00298   Healpix_Map<float> map(0,RING);
00299   read_Healpix_map_from_fits(infile,map,colnum,2);
00300   for (int m=0; m<map.Npix(); ++m)
00301     {
00302     if (!approx<double>(map[m],Healpix_undef))
00303       {
00304       map[m] = (map[m]+offset)*factor;
00305       if (logflag)
00306         {
00307         if (map[m]<=0)
00308           map[m] = Healpix_undef;
00309         else
00310           map[m] = float(log(double(map[m]))/ln10);
00311         }
00312       if (asinhflag)
00313         {
00314         if (map[m]>=0)
00315           map[m] = float(log(double(map[m]+sqrt(map[m]*map[m]+1))));
00316         else
00317           map[m] = float(-log(double(-map[m]+sqrt(map[m]*map[m]+1))));
00318         }
00319       if (min_supplied) if (map[m] < usermin) map[m] = usermin;
00320       if (max_supplied) if (map[m] > usermax) map[m] = usermax;
00321       }
00322     }
00323 
00324   arr2<float> imgarr;
00325   float minv, maxv;
00326   if (mollpro)
00327     pro_mollw (map,lon0,lat0,xres,imgarr,minv,maxv,interpol);
00328   else
00329     pro_gno (map,lon0,lat0,xres,res,imgarr,minv,maxv,interpol);
00330 
00331   arr<double> newpos;
00332   if (eqflag) histo_eq(imgarr,minv,maxv,newpos);
00333 
00334   if (min_supplied) minv = usermin;
00335   if (max_supplied) maxv = usermax;
00336   if (maxv==minv) maxv=minv+1e-10f;
00337 
00338   int xsz=imgarr.size1();
00339   int ysz=imgarr.size2();
00340   int yofs=ysz;
00341   int scale = max(1,xsz/800);
00342   if (bar) ysz+=60*scale;
00343   if (title != "") { ysz+=50*scale; yofs+=50*scale; }
00344   LS_Image img(xsz,ysz);
00345   img.fill(Colour(1,1,1));
00346   img.set_font (giant_font);
00347   Palette pal;
00348   pal.setPredefined(palnr);
00349   if (title != "")
00350     img.annotate_centered(xsz/2,25*scale,Colour(0,0,0),title,scale);
00351   for (tsize i=0; i<imgarr.size1(); ++i)
00352     for (tsize j=0; j<imgarr.size2(); ++j)
00353       {
00354       if (imgarr[i][j]>-1e32)
00355         {
00356         Colour c(0.5,0.5,0.5);
00357         if (!approx<double>(imgarr[i][j],Healpix_undef))
00358           {
00359           int col = int((imgarr[i][j]-minv)/(maxv-minv)*256);
00360           col = min(255,max(col,0));
00361           float colfrac = (imgarr[i][j]-minv)/(maxv-minv);
00362           if (flippal) colfrac = 1-colfrac;
00363           c = pal.Get_Colour(colfrac);
00364           }
00365         img.put_pixel(i,yofs-j-1,c);
00366         }
00367       }
00368 
00369   if (bar)
00370     {
00371     colorbar (img,pal,xsz/10,(xsz*9)/10,ysz-40*scale,ysz-20*scale,flippal,
00372       newpos);
00373     img.set_font (medium_bold_font);
00374     img.annotate_centered (xsz/20,ysz-30*scale,Colour(0,0,0),conv(minv),scale);
00375     img.annotate_centered ((xsz*19)/20,ysz-30*scale,Colour(0,0,0),conv(maxv),
00376       scale);
00377     }
00378   img.write_TGA(outfile);
00379 
00380   if (viewer!="")
00381     {
00382     int retcode = system((viewer+" "+outfile).c_str());
00383     if (retcode != 0)
00384       cout << "Warning: viewer return code was " << retcode << endl;
00385     }
00386 
00387   return 0;
00388   }
